messages.title: Best for Reading West
messages.content: The government wasted billions on a top-down reorganisation of our NHS, money that could have been better spent protecting front-line staff.

messages.title: Best for our NHS
messages.content: When partners at Circuit Lane Surgery took the difficult decision to resign their NHS contract, Victoria worked with local residents to keep the surgery open in public hands. As a result, the surgery will stay in the hands of an NHS provider on an interim basis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government would invest in our NHS, guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours and bring back the cancer drugs fund for tests for cancer patients.

mentions.candidate: Victoria worked with local residents to keep the surgery open in public hands. As a result, the surgery will stay in the hands of an NHS provider on an interim basis.

issues.health: A Labour government would invest in our NHS, guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours and bring back the cancer drugs fund for tests for cancer patients.

contactInformation.address: FREPOST RSBA-LTSH-BRCS 3 Windsor Square Silver Street Reading RG1 2TH

images.caption: Victoria with local residents campaigning to keep Circuit Lane Surgery open.
